info.title: Open Notebook API
info.description: API for Open Notebook - Research Assistant

get.description:
Check if authentication is enabled.
Returns whether a password is required to access the API.

Get frontend configuration.

Returns version information and health status.
Note: The frontend determines the API URL via its own runtime-config endpoint,
so this endpoint no longer returns apiUrl.

Also checks for version updates from GitHub (with caching and error handling).
Get all notebooks with optional filtering and ordering.

schema.title: Response Get Notebooks Api Notebooks Get

post.description: Create a new notebook.

get.description: Get a specific notebook by ID.

post.description: Add an existing source to a notebook (create the reference).

delete.description: Remove a source from a notebook (delete the reference).

post.description: Search the knowledge base using text or vector search.
Ask the knowledge base a question using AI models.
Ask the knowledge base a question and return a simple response (non-streaming).

get.description: Get all configured models with optional type filtering.

schema.title: Response Get Models Api Models Get

post.description: Create a new model configuration.

get.description: Get default model assignments.
Get provider availability based on environment variables.
Get all transformations.

schema.title: Response Get Transformations Api Transformations Get

post.description: Create a new transformation.
Execute a transformation on input text.

get.description: Get the default transformation prompt.
Get a specific transformation by ID.
Get all notes with optional notebook filtering.

schema.title: Response Get Notes Api Notes Get

post.description: Create a new note.

get.description: Get a specific note by ID.

post.description: Embed content for vector search.

Start a background job to rebuild embeddings.

- **mode**: "existing" (re-embed items with embeddings) or "all" (embed everything)
- **include_sources**: Include sources in rebuild (default: true)
- **include_notes**: Include notes in rebuild (default: true)
- **include_insights**: Include insights in rebuild (default: true)

Returns command ID to track progress and estimated item count.

get.description:
Get the status of a rebuild operation.

Returns:
- **status**: queued, running, completed, failed
- **progress**: processed count, total count, percentage
- **stats**: breakdown by type (sources, notes, insights, failed)
- **timestamps**: started_at, completed_at
Get all application settings.

post.description: Get context for a notebook based on configuration.

get.description: Get sources with pagination and sorting support.

parameters.name: sort_by

schema.description: Field to sort by (created or updated)
schema.title: Sort By

parameters.description: Field to sort by (created or updated)

schema.title: Response Get Sources Api Sources Get

post.description: Create a new source with support for both JSON and multipart form data.
Create a new source using JSON payload (legacy endpoint for backward compatibility).

get.description: Get a specific source by ID.

head.description: Check if a source has a downloadable file.

get.description: Download the original file associated with an uploaded source.
Get processing status for a source.

post.description: Retry processing for a failed or stuck source.

get.description: Get all insights for a specific source.

schema.title: Response Get Source Insights Api Sources  Source Id  Insights Get

post.description: Create a new insight for a source by running a transformation.

get.description: Get a specific insight by ID.

post.description: Convert an insight to a note.

get.description: List command jobs with optional filtering

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of jobs to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of jobs to return

schema.title: Response List Command Jobs Api Commands Jobs Get

get.description: Get the status of a specific command job
Debug endpoint to see what commands are registered

post.description:
Generate a podcast episode using Episode Profiles.
Returns immediately with job ID for status tracking.

get.description: Get the status of a podcast generation job
List all podcast episodes

schema.title: Response List Podcast Episodes Api Podcasts Episodes Get

get.description: Get a specific podcast episode

delete.description: Delete a podcast episode and its associated audio file

get.description: Stream the audio file associated with a podcast episode
List all available episode profiles

schema.title: Response List Episode Profiles Api Episode Profiles Get

post.description: Create a new episode profile

get.description: Get a specific episode profile by name

post.description: Duplicate an episode profile

get.description: List all available speaker profiles

schema.title: Response List Speaker Profiles Api Speaker Profiles Get

post.description: Create a new speaker profile

get.description: Get a specific speaker profile by name

post.description: Duplicate a speaker profile

get.description: Get all chat sessions for a notebook.

schema.title: Response Get Sessions Api Chat Sessions Get

post.description: Create a new chat session.

get.description: Get a specific session with its messages.

post.description: Execute a chat request and get AI response.
Build context for a notebook based on context configuration.
Create a new chat session for a source.

get.description: Get all chat sessions for a source.

schema.title: Response Get Source Chat Sessions Api Sources  Source Id  Chat Sessions Get

get.description: Get a specific source chat session with its messages.

put.description: Update source chat session title and/or model override.

post.description: Send a message to source chat session with SSE streaming response.
